text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day after I fail to scout Gold City,<n>I'm walking along
under the trees,<n>when...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: So, that big fuss out on the<n>course—that was City, wasn't it?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
I think the guy she was arguing with<n>was her trainer?
Seemed pretty<n>heated. Wonder if she's okay...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I don't like the sound of that. I'd<n>better go take a look!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Then, what? You're saying I should<n>just stop training?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
No, no, not at all. It's just, you don't<n>want to put on too
much muscle and<n>ruin your proportions, or get any<n>nasty
scratches on your body!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Form is what you should be working<n>on. Looking pretty
while you run is the<n>name of the game for you. Oh, that<n>
and winning concert practice!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
Okay, so, is any of that gonna help me<n>run faster? Help me
win?

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wait, that's what you're worriedabout? It'll be fine. I'll handle it. Thetrick is, you just gotta run in racesyou know you can win.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Then there won't be a scratch on<n>your reputation! The
glamorous, the<n>victorious Gold City—star of the show!<n>The
perfect plan, am I right?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: No... No, no, no! That's not who Iwant to be!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Tell me... Why?

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text:
You said... you'd make me the top<n>Umamusume. That I'd be
the brightest<n>star on the turf.

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: So why? ...Why are you giving me this<n>crap?!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What? No, no, my stance hasn'tchanged. I mean c'mon, you'rethe Gold City.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Everyone talks about you—the cool<n>and fierce model!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You'll be great. Just leave it all to me!<n>How to present you,
how to make you<n>shine—I've got it all figured out.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You just have to do what I say! It's<n>for your own good. I
mean, that's<n>what a trainer's for, isn't it?
choice_data_list: That's not what a real trainer does!

text_block_list.name: Gold City
text_block_list.text: Huh? Y-you again... Why are you...

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
And who do you think you are? Why<n>don't you mind your
own business,<n>huh?
choice_data_list: A real trainer listens to their trainee!
A real trainer listens to their trainee!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Oh yeah? You got some nerve, pal!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
H-hey! ...Kid doesn't know what's<n>good for her. I coulda
made her a star.

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Dodged a bullet with that temper,<n>though. Oh well, plenty of
fish in the<n>sea.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I need to make sure she's all right!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My search takes me all across<n>campus to no avail. There's
only one<n>place I haven't looked...

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Uwaaah! What, what is it?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
You scared me... Seriously, what's<n>going on? You the
paparazzi or<n>something?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain the predicament and ask if<n>she knows where Gold
City could be.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Sooo, you feel the need to find her,<n>why? ...Kinda sus.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I know you're trying to scout her, but<n>like, you're just after
her looks,<n>aren't you? I mean, I get it—she's<n>drop dead
gorgeous.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
But that means you're like, not any<n>different from her
manager, you<n>know?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: So lemme ask you. Why do care<n>about her?
choice_data_list: She's a hard worker, and I want to support her.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Support her, huh.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: So like, you're gonna do what,<n>exactly, for her?

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: You got nothing?! Wait, like actually?<n>Not a good look.
choice_data_list: I mean, I barely know anything about her... yet.
I mean, I barely know anything about her... yet.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?
choice_data_list: I want to talk to her, and get to know her.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Only then can I decide what to do—her<n>input is just as
important as mine.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Uh-huh... Well, you do you.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Wait, why's it feel like you're waiting<n>for me to say
something? Can you<n>not?
choice_data_list: Please, tell me where she is!
Please, tell me where she is!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Wh-whoa there, don't creep any<n>closer! Nope, not doing
this!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Ugh, again? You've got to be joking!
choice_data_list: Please! You have to tell me!
Please! You have to tell me!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: No! Just, no! And stay away!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Phew. Should be safe he—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: How are you still following me?!Just get lost already!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Stop! Ugh, I can't with you! Why are<n>you asking me,
anyway?!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
I literally have no idea where she<n>could be. I mean, the
riverbank, I<n>guess, but—

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh, shoot.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey, wait a sec!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text:
Don't tell her you found out from me,<n>okay? Seriously, you
better not tell!<n>She's legit scary when she's mad!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Hey! Are you listening?!
